author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Searches Shodan using facets to get summary information on properties.
commands.name: search

commands.description: Returns all services that have been found on the IP address of the searched host.
commands.name: ip

commands.description: Returns the total number of results that match only the specified query or facet settings. This command does not return host results. This command does not consume query credits.
commands.name: shodan-search-count

commands.description: Requests Shodan to crawl a network.
commands.name: shodan-scan-ip

commands.description: Requests for Shodan to perform a scan on the specified port and protocol.
commands.name: shodan-scan-internet

commands.description: Checks the progress of a previously submitted scan request on the specified port and protocol.
commands.name: shodan-scan-status

commands.description: Creates a network alert for a defined IP address or netblock used for subscribing to changes or events that are discovered within the netblock's range.
commands.name: shodan-create-network-alert

commands.description: Gets the details of a network alert.
commands.name: shodan-network-get-alert-by-id

commands.description: Gets a list of all created network alerts.
commands.name: shodan-network-get-alerts

commands.description: Enables receiving notifications for network alerts that are set off by the specified triggers.
commands.name: shodan-network-alert-set-trigger

commands.description: Disables receiving notifications for network alerts that are set off by the specified triggers.
commands.name: shodan-network-alert-remove-trigger

commands.description: Ignores the specified services for network alerts that are set off by the specified triggers.
commands.name: shodan-network-alert-whitelist-service

commands.description: Resumes receiving notifications for network alerts that are set off by the specified triggers.
commands.name: shodan-network-alert-remove-service-from-whitelist

integration.description: A search engine used for searching Internet-connected devices
integration.name: Shodan v2

description: A search engine used for searching Internet-connected devices
name: Shodan
